member.summary: Checks if the specified is a private (RFC 1918, RFC 4193) or link local (RFC 5735, RFC 3927, RFC 4291)
member.returns: True if the specified is a private or link local; otherwise false

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.Default.TryGetExternal(System.Net.IPHostEntry)

member.returns: an external IP; otherwise the first local or private IP

member.name: T:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service
member.summary: Data Dissemination Web Service is used by the NSI to disseminate data, exposing it for queries. It is the main class of the NSI web service it encapsulates of the application logic and it is responsible for performing the call to the QueryParser, applying the query and returning the resulting dataset.
member.example:
A simple client in C#
The WSDLSettings class used by the client

member.summary: The logger

member.summary: The _soap fault exception builder

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.GetCompactData(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Web Method that is used to retrieve sdmx data in compact format based on a sdmx query
member.returns: The queried data in sdmx compact format

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.GetCrossSectionalData(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Web Method that is used to retrieve sdmx data in cross sectional format based on a sdmx query
member.returns: The queried data in sdmx cross sectional format

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.GetGenericData(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Web Method that is used to retrieve sdmx data in generic format based on a sdmx query
member.returns: The queried data in sdmx generic format

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.QueryStructure(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Web Method that is used to retrieve sdmx structural metadata based on a sdmx query structure request
member.returns: The sdmx structural metadata inside a RegistryInterface QueryStructureResponse

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.Test(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Web Method that is used for testing purposes and retrieve SDMX data by calling the other web methods of this service. The method accept as an input a file path to the xml file containing the SDMX query, and a string specifying the format for the output data
member.param: The complete file path to the file containing the SDMX query

The string specifying the format. The accepted values are:
compact
cross
general
member.returns: The result of the query in the specified format

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.DataDisseminationWS.NSIStdV20Service.HandleRequest(System.Xml.XmlNode,Estat.Sri.Ws.Controllers.Controller.IController{System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Xml.XmlWriter},Estat.Sri.Ws.Controllers.Constants.SoapOperation)
member.summary: The method that handle the processing of the SDMX query and orchestrate the calls to different building blocks.
member.param: The xml containing the query bean
member.returns: The queried data in specified format

member.summary: Web Service used by NSI for data dissemination and structural metadata retrieval. This service uses the SDMX 2.0 Schema files with Eurostat extensions

member.name: T:Resources.Messages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.app_copyright
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Copyright (c) 2009 by the European Commission, represented by Eurostat..

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.app_description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to NSI Web Service provider.

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.app_version
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to v{0}.

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.help_external
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This page appears to be have been requested using an external (internet) host name or IP address. External should be able to access the endpoints configured for NSI Web Service using one of the above URLs..

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.help_localhost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Warning. This page appears to have been requested using a local or internal host name or IP. The above endpoints are not accessible from external users. Please contact your network administrator to retrieve the external hostname or IP for this web service..

member.name: P:Resources.Messages.help_not_external
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Warning. This page appears to have been requested using a local or internal host name or IP. The above endpoint URL might not be accessible from external users. Please contact your network administrator to retrieve the external hostname or IP for this web service..
